channel.title: BUscience

item.title: Scientists probe the mystery of Titan's missing deltas

item.title: Generative AI's diagnostic capabilities comparable to non-specialist doctors
item.description: A research team conducted a meta-analysis of the diagnostic capabilities of generative AI in the field of medicine using 83 research papers.
